**Backflow Prevention Program Phase 2A**

**Reference:** WS3784336449-Doc3784338932

**Date of Publication:** December 9, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

**Status:** Expired

**Scope:** This tender is seeking proposals from qualified contractors for the installation of backflow preventers on domestic water mains and fire suppression systems in various buildings in Ottawa. The purpose of this project is to support the city's effort to maintain the quality of its drinking water supply.

**Scope of Work:**

* Installation of backflow preventers on domestic water main entrances
* Installation of backflow preventers on fire suppression systems
* Testing and commissioning of installed backflow preventers

**Location:** Ottawa, Ontario

**Type of Contract:** Competitive Bid

**Selection Criteria:** The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Robert Angell (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: robert.angell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
